languages.text: "Данное место взывает к Омниссии об акте очистительного и благостного ксеноцида. Пространственная дисгармония, наблюдаемая здесь, указывает на его анафематическую природу. Впрочем..." {n}Вокс некоторое время тихо шипит.{/n} "Полное истребление не рекомендовано. Носители технических знаний должны быть отловлены и подвергнуты допросу и вивисекции перед утилизацией".

"This place is calling out to the Omnissiah for an act of purifying and gracious xenocide. The spatial disharmony observed here points to its anathematic nature. That being said..." {n}The vox hisses quietly for a while.{/n} "Complete extermination is not advised. Those in possession of technological knowledge should be rounded up and subjected to interrogation and vivisection prior to disposal."
languages.original_text: "Данное место взывает к Омниссии об акте очистительного и благостного ксеноцида. Пространственная дисгармония, наблюдаемая здесь, указывает на его анафематическую природу. Впрочем..." {n}Вокс некоторое время тихо шипит.{/n} "Полное истребление не рекомендовано. Носители технических знаний должны быть отловлены и подвергнуты допросу и вивисекции перед утилизацией".

traits.locale_text: "This place is calling out to the Omnissiah for an act of purifying and gracious xenocide. The spatial disharmony observed here points to its anathematic nature. That being said..." {n}The vox hisses quietly for a while.{/n} "Complete extermination is not advised. Those in possession of technological knowledge should be rounded up and subjected to interrogation and vivisection prior to being disposed of."

Those in possession of technological knowledge should be rounded up and subjected to interrogation and vivisection prior to being disposed of."

Those in possession of technological knowledge should be rounded up and subjected to interrogation and vivisection prior to disposal."

"This place is calling out to the Omnissiah for an act of purifying and gracious xenocide. The spatial disharmony observed here points to its anathematic nature. That being said..." {n}The vox hisses quietly for a while.{/n} "Complete extermination is not advised. Those in possession of technological knowledge should be rounded up and subjected to interrogation and vivisection prior to disposal."

languages.text: “这个地方需要欧姆尼塞亚彻底执行净化与灭绝程序。观测结果表明，这里的空间充满了不和谐感，这说明了这片区域令人厌恶的本质。话虽如此……”{n}音阵合成器发出了安静的嘶嘶声。{/n}“并不建议进行彻底灭绝。那些拥有技术知识的个体应该被集中起来，先进行审讯与活体解剖，之后再进行处理。”
languages.original_text: "This place is calling out to the Omnissiah for an act of purifying and gracious xenocide. The spatial disharmony observed here points to its anathematic nature. That being said..." {n}The vox hisses quietly for a while.{/n} "Complete extermination is not advised. Those in possession of technological knowledge should be rounded up and subjected to interrogation and vivisection prior to disposal."

traits.locale_text: “这个地方需要欧姆尼塞亚彻底执行净化与灭绝程序。观测结果表明，这里的空间充满了不和谐感，这说明了这片区域令人厌恶的本质。话虽如此……”{n}音阵合成器发出了安静的嘶嘶声。{/n}“并不建议进行彻底灭绝。那些拥有技术知识的个体应该被集中起来，先进行审讯与活体解剖，之后再进行处理。”

languages.text: «Este lugar clama al Omnissiah, pidiendo un xenocidio purificador y agraciado. La desarmonía espacial que observo indica su naturaleza anatemática. Dicho esto...». {n}El voco sisea silenciosamente durante un tiempo.{/n} «No se recomienda el exterminio completo. Quienes poseen conocimientos tecnológicos deberían ser capturados y sometidos a interrogatorio y vivisección antes de su eliminación».
languages.original_text: "This place is calling out to the Omnissiah for an act of purifying and gracious xenocide. The spatial disharmony observed here points to its anathematic nature. That being said..." {n}The vox hisses quietly for a while.{/n} "Complete extermination is not advised. Those in possession of technological knowledge should be rounded up and subjected to interrogation and vivisection prior to disposal."

traits.locale_text: «Este lugar clama al Omnissiah, pidiendo un xenocidio purificador y agraciado. La desarmonía espacial que observo indica su naturaleza anatemática. Dicho esto...». {n}El voco sisea silenciosamente durante un tiempo.{/n} «No se recomienda el exterminio completo. Quienes poseen conocimientos tecnológicos deberían ser capturados y sometidos a interrogatorio y vivisección antes de su eliminación».

languages.text: 「この場所は、浄化と寛大な異種族殲滅を求めて万機神に呼びかけている。ここで観察される空間的な不調和は、その異質な性質を示している。あの存在は告げた…」{n}ヴォクスはしばらくの間、静かに唸る。{/n}「完全な絶滅はお勧めできない。技術的知識を持っている者は、処分する前に一網打尽にし、尋問と生体解剖を行うべきだ」
languages.original_text: "This place is calling out to the Omnissiah for an act of purifying and gracious xenocide. The spatial disharmony observed here points to its anathematic nature. That being said..." {n}The vox hisses quietly for a while.{/n} "Complete extermination is not advised. Those in possession of technological knowledge should be rounded up and subjected to interrogation and vivisection prior to disposal."

traits.locale_text: 「この場所は、浄化と寛大な異種族殲滅を求めて万機神に呼びかけている。ここで観察される空間的な不調和は、その異質な性質を示している。あの存在は告げた…」{n}ヴォクスはしばらくの間、静かに唸る。{/n}「完全な絶滅はお勧めできない。技術的知識を持っている者は、処分する前に一網打尽にし、尋問と生体解剖を行うべきだ」

languages.text: "Dieser Ort schreit förmlich danach, dass der Omnissiah einen Akt der Reinigung und des gnadenvollen Xenozids ausführt. Die räumliche Disharmonie hier ist ein Beleg für das anathematische Wesen des Orts. Allerdings ..." {n}Das Vox zischt eine Weile lang leise.{/n} "Eine vollständige Exterminierung ist nicht angeraten. Wer technologisches Wissen besitzt, sollte vor der Beseitigung verhört und einer Vivisektion unterzogen werden."
languages.original_text: "This place is calling out to the Omnissiah for an act of purifying and gracious xenocide. The spatial disharmony observed here points to its anathematic nature. That being said..." {n}The vox hisses quietly for a while.{/n} "Complete extermination is not advised. Those in possession of technological knowledge should be rounded up and subjected to interrogation and vivisection prior to disposal."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Ort schreit förmlich danach, dass der Omnissiah einen Akt der Reinigung und des gnadenvollen Xenozids ausführt. Die räumliche Disharmonie hier ist ein Beleg für das anathematische Wesen des Orts. Allerdings ..." {n}Das Vox zischt eine Weile lang leise.{/n} "Eine vollständige Exterminierung ist nicht angeraten. Wer technologisches Wissen besitzt, sollte vor der Beseitigung verhört und einer Vivisektion unterzogen werden."

languages.text: « Ce lieu réclame à l'Omnimessie qu'on le purifie par le biais d'un xénocide bienveillant. La dissonance spatiale que l'on peut y observer est un signe de sa nature anathématique. Cela dit... » {n}Le vox siffle doucement pendant quelques instants.{/n} « Une extermination totale n'est pas conseillée. Il vaut mieux rassembler les êtres en possession de connaissances technologiques afin de les soumettre à un interrogatoire et à la vivisection, avant de passer à leur élimination. »
languages.original_text: "This place is calling out to the Omnissiah for an act of purifying and gracious xenocide. The spatial disharmony observed here points to its anathematic nature. That being said..." {n}The vox hisses quietly for a while.{/n} "Complete extermination is not advised. Those in possession of technological knowledge should be rounded up and subjected to interrogation and vivisection prior to disposal."

Il vaut mieux rassembler les êtres en possession de connaissances technologiques afin de les soumettre à un interrogatoire et à la vivisection, avant de passer à leur élimination. »

languages.original_text: "This place is calling out to the Omnissiah for an act of purifying and gracious xenocide. The spatial disharmony observed here points to its anathematic nature. That being said..." {n}The vox hisses quietly for a while.{/n} "Complete extermination is not advised. Those in possession of technological knowledge should be rounded up and subjected to interrogation and vivisection prior to disposal."

languages.text: "Bu yer, Hermesih'in arındırma ve zenokıyım lütfunda bulunmasını talep ediyor. Burada gözlenen dâhili ahenksizlik, saf kötü bir doğası olduğunu gösteriyor. Yine de..." {n}Voks, bir süre sessizce tıslıyor.{/n} "Topyekûn imha tavsiye edilmiyor. Teknolojik bilgiyi elinde barındıranlar; yok edim öncesinde alıkonmalı, sorguya tabi tutulmalı ve parçalarına ayrılarak incelenmeli."
languages.original_text: "This place is calling out to the Omnissiah for an act of purifying and gracious xenocide. The spatial disharmony observed here points to its anathematic nature. That being said..." {n}The vox hisses quietly for a while.{/n} "Complete extermination is not advised. Those in possession of technological knowledge should be rounded up and subjected to interrogation and vivisection prior to disposal."

traits.locale_text: "Bu yer, Hermesih'in arındırma ve zenokıyım lütfunda bulunmasını talep ediyor gibi. Burada gözlenen dâhili ahenksizlik, saf kötü bir doğaya işaret ediyor. Yine de..." {n}Voks bir süre sessizce tıslıyor.{/n} "Topyekûn imha tavsiye edilmemekte. Teknolojik bilgiyi elinde barındıranlar, ortadan kaldırılma öncesinde alıkonmalı, sorguya tabi tutulmalı ve parçalarına ayrılarak incelenmeli."
